ReleaseInfo.Name: HomeGenie
ReleaseInfo.ReleaseNote: - Updated French locale files - Added Hard Reset option to Z-Wave interface settings (UI) - Added ZWaveLib Controller.SoftReset and Controller.HardReset functions - Added Z-Wave.Me thermostat widget - Added node timeout error message to ZWaveLib - Fixed ZWaveLib bug affecting nodes discovery (issue #66) - Small fix to ZWaveLib (issue #66)
